rows.label: tlk401011_msg0001
rows.name:
We've gathered quite a
bit of information...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0002
rows.name:
There were all sorts of rumors,
from baseless to plausible.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0003
rows.name:
Let's try to sort through
the information.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0004
rows.name: It's deduction time!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0005
rows.name:
Let's start with the basics, mo...
Who is targeting the summit, mo?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0006
rows.name:
It's former Chairman Bahn,
mo. Have you forgotten
already, Masterpon, mo?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0007
rows.name: N-no, that's not it, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0008
rows.name:
Even if it's obvious, it's
tradition to organize the
basic information first, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0009
rows.name:
I need Boss to think a little
harder before answering, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0010
rows.name: Alright, alright.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0011
rows.name:
Next, let's consider the
location of the summit.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0012
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0013
rows.name: Where is the summit being held?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0014
rows.name: The Acedian Cathedral

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0015
rows.name: The Superbian Divine Beast battleship

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0016
rows.name: It was the Acedian Cathedral, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0017
rows.name:
Nah, that's where the
last summit was held.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0018
rows.name:
This is a meeting between the Emperor
of Superbia and the Queen of Invidia,
so it wouldn't be there.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0019
rows.name:
It's the Superbian Divine
Beast battleship.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0020
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0021
rows.name:
They mentioned assassination,
but what method do you
think they'll use?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0022
rows.name: What's the assassination method?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0023
rows.name: Sink the entire battleship

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0024
rows.name: Stabbing

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0025
rows.name: Poison

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0026
rows.name:
There was a rumor about sinking
the entire Superbian Divine
Beast battleship, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0027
rows.name: That's terrible, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0028
rows.name: We have to go save Meleph-san...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0029
rows.name:
Wait a minute. There was
no such rumor, was there?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0030
rows.name:
That's right. They said the
Superbian battleship was strong,
so outside attacks wouldn't work.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0031
rows.name:
Huh? Now that you mention
it, I think that's right...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0032
rows.name: Let's rethink this.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0033
rows.name:
There was a rumor about a spy
stabbing someone, wasn't there?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0034
rows.name: There was, there was, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0035
rows.name:
I heard a story about a spy stabbing
them with a knife when the Emperor
and Queen shake hands, mo!

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0036
rows.name: That is Masterpon's fantasy, mo.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0037
rows.name: There was no such story.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0038
rows.name: Momomo!?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0039
rows.name:
Didn't they say that only trusted
individuals from both Superbia
and Invidia would be present?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0040
rows.name: That should be safe, then.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0041
rows.name:
Rex, you can't just say
whatever comes to mind.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0042
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0043
rows.name: I think... it might be poison.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0044
rows.name:
They said the ship's defenses
are perfect, and only trusted
people will be there.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0045
rows.name:
In that case, poison seems like
the most effective method.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0046
rows.name:
Then when and where would
the poison be administered?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0047
rows.name:
When and where will the
poison be administered?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0048
rows.name: The banquet food

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0049
rows.name:
The drinking water
during the conference

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0050
rows.name:
What if they poison the drinking
water during the conference?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0051
rows.name:
But aren't only trusted people
attending the conference?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0052
rows.name:
It might be possible to poison the
water beforehand, couldn't it?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0053
rows.name:
If it were me, I wouldn't
drink the water.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0054
rows.name:
You can't trust what's
prepared by strangers, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0055
rows.name: Is that how it is?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0056
rows.name: Isn't there a more reliable method?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0057
rows.name: It has to be the banquet food, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0058
rows.name:
They probably wouldn't cook
themselves, after all.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0059
rows.name:
I'd like to see Meleph-sama and
Kagutsuchi cooking, though.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0060
rows.name:
And didn't someone say a lot of
weird ingredients were brought in?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0061
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0062
rows.name:
And a large wooden box
was brought in too, mo.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0063
rows.name: Maybe to hide the taste of the poison?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0064
rows.name: You're sharp, Rex. That must be it.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0065
rows.name:
Now we just need to figure
out who's doing it.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0066
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0067
rows.name: Who will administer the poison?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0068
rows.name: The refugees

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0069
rows.name: The Tirkin

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0070
rows.name: The people of Acedia

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0071
rows.name: The refugees were very angry.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0072
rows.name:
They lost their homes in the war
between Superbia and Invidia.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0073
rows.name:
They probably aren't
happy about the summit.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0074
rows.name: It's possible that Bahn is using them.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0075
rows.name:
But could the refugees get close
enough to the food to poison it?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0076
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0077
rows.name: I think it's the Tirkin.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0078
rows.name: That's what the girl told us, right?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0079
rows.name:
When Bahn was making artificial
Blades in Superbia, he used
Tirkin as his minions, mo.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0080
rows.name:
And it would be cheaper than
hiring a professional assassin.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0081
rows.name: But do you think Tirkin can cook?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0082
rows.name: I've never heard of such a thing...

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0083
rows.name: Maybe it's the people of Acedia?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0084
rows.name: They certainly seemed very annoyed.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0085
rows.name:
It felt like more than annoyance,
like they despised them, mo.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0086
rows.name:
I can understand their feelings, but
I doubt anyone would go that far.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0087
rows.name:
The people of Acedia are not
known for desiring conflict.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0088
rows.name: Hmmm... Then who could it be...?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0089
rows.name:
Hey, talking here won't
get us anywhere.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0090
rows.name:
Since we know there's a possibility
of poison, why don't we go to the
Superbian Divine Beast battleship?

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0091
rows.name:
You're right. No matter
who the culprit is, it's
faster to take action.

rows.label: tlk401011_msg0092
rows.name:
Then it's decided! Let's head
to the dining hall of the
Superbian battleship, mo!
